mapper.select: SELECT UPPER(TABLE_NAME) AS TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES T WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = #{tableSchema}

SELECT TABLE_NAME ,COLUMN_NAME ,CASE WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'varchar' THEN 'String' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'timestamp' THEN 'Date' ELSE DATA_TYPE END AS DATA_TYPE ,COLUMN_COMMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS T WHERE TABLE_NAME = #{value}
